page.title: 16Notable Events in Mabe
page.content: The most notable event in{Mabe}is most probably the{"Steam up and Shindig". {This is an annual event}which happens usually on a{"bank holiday Monday". {This year it was held}on the{27th May {1985.}Every year hundreds of people attend to this event and the money raised go to the new{Youth}and Community Centre .At this{Shindig {there was a pig roast,}hoopla stall,hot dog and beef burger stand, clothes tent, toy tent, food tent and pony rides.Each year they have something different, this year for an attraction they had a parachutest who was going to jump out of a helicopter and try to land on a plastic disc but it had to be put off because of rain.There is also another event this is{Mabe Carnival}which is normally held at the end of{August. { }
